name: Stay in the Line or DIE!
name_original: Stay in the Line or DIE!
description:
Rules:

  1. Try to stay in a line as much as possible to generate health.
  2. Changing lines & Colliding with enemies reduce your health.
  3. Use Up & Down Arrows To Move.

Goal: Stay Alive when the timer is over.

Made for DevAtlas Jam - March (Theme: Hold the line)

Software:

  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Audio: Bosca
  • Pixel Art: Gimp
